summary: An ordinance relating to plumbing; providing for the examination and licensing of journeyman plumbers, and for the licensing, registration and bonding of master plumbers; creating an Examination Board for Journeyman Plumbers; defining offenses and providing penalties for violation hereof; amending Ordinance no. 48022, (The License Code), by adding thereto eleven (11) additional sections numbered 249, 250, 251, 252, 253, 254, 255, 256, 257, 258, and 259, and repealing Ordinance No. 50052.
